item.title: I-JEPA: Image-based Joint Embedding Predictive Architecture
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: A non-generative, self-supervised framework predicting high-level feature representations of masked regions from visible context, enabling scalable and efficient visual pretraining.

item.title: MaskFeat: Masked Feature Prediction for Self-Supervised Visual Pre-Training
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: Predict handcrafted features (e.g., HOG) of masked regions instead of raw pixels.

item.title: BYOL: Bootstrap Your Own Latent
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: Learn representations by predicting one networkâ€™s output from anotherâ€™s, without using negative samples.

item.title: DINO: Self-Distillation with No Labels
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: A student network learns from a teacher network using self-distillation, producing emergent semantic attention maps.

item.title: MAE: Masked Autoencoders Are Scalable Vision Learners
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: Randomly mask image patches and reconstruct the missing ones to learn context-aware visual representations.

item.title: SwAV: Swapping Assignments between Views
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: Simultaneously cluster the data and learn visual representations by enforcing consistency between cluster assignments, or ‘codes’, generated from different augmented views of the same image.

item.title: MoCo: Momentum Contrast for Unsupervised Visual Representation Learning
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: It stabilizes and scales contrastive learning by maintaining a dynamic dictionary with momentum-based updates, becoming a cornerstone for modern SSL methods.

item.title: SimCLR: A Simple Framework for Contrastive Learning of Visual Representations
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: Learn invariant representations by maximizing similarity between augmented views of the same image while contrasting with others.

item.title: About Me
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hi, I’m a researcher, developer, and content creator.

item.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to Remote Sensing Data and Python Setup
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: Learn about raster and vector data and set up your Python environment
